metadata.feature_description: Test URL generation for specific pages with custom parameters and query strings

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test URL generation for existing page

steps.action: Navigate to Settings > SEO > URL Management > TEST URL tab
steps.expected: Test URL panel should be displayed with Page to Test dropdown
steps.actual: Test URL panel displayed with Page to Test dropdown, Query String field, Custom Page Name field, and Test URL button

steps.action: Select 'Home' page from Page to Test dropdown and click Test URL
steps.expected: URLs should be generated for all portal aliases/locales
steps.actual: Generated 6 URLs for all locales: http://localhost:8081/, http://localhost:8081/en-us/, http://localhost:8081/es-ar/, http://localhost:8081/fr-fr/, http://localhost:8081/de-de/, http://localhost:8081/ar-er/

steps.action: Select 'Our Products' page, enter 'my-custom-page.aspx' in Custom Page Name field, and click Test URL
steps.expected: URLs should include the custom page name appended to the page URL
steps.actual: Generated URLs with custom page name: http://localhost:8081/Our-Products/my-custom-page, http://localhost:8081/en-us/Our-Products/my-custom-page, etc. for all locales

steps.action: Select 'Our Products' page, enter '&category=electronics&sort=price' in Add Query String field, and click Test URL
steps.expected: URLs should include the query string parameters
steps.actual: Generated URLs with query string: http://localhost:8081/Our-Products?category=electronics&sort=price, http://localhost:8081/en-us/Our-Products?category=electronics&sort=price, etc. for all locales

steps.action: Generate URLs for any page and verify locale-specific URLs
steps.expected: URLs should be generated for all configured locales (en-us, es-ar, fr-fr, de-de, ar-er)
steps.actual: All URL generation tests showed URLs for 6 different locales/portal aliases: root, en-us, es-ar, fr-fr, de-de, ar-er

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test URL Rewriting for valid URL

steps.action: Enter 'http://localhost:8081/en-us/Our-Products' in URL to Test field and click Test URL Rewriting
steps.expected: System should identify the page and language/culture from the URL
steps.actual: Rewriting Result: Default.aspx?TabId=22&language=en-US, Identified Language/Culture: en-US, Identified Page: Our Products, Operation Messages: ActiveTab: 22/Our Products IsSecure: False

steps.action: Enter 'http://localhost:8081/en-us/NonExistentPage12345' in URL to Test field and click Test URL Rewriting
steps.expected: System should handle the non-existent page gracefully
steps.actual: System handled gracefully: Rewriting Result: Default.aspx?TabId=75&language=en-US&NonExistentPage12345, Identified Language/Culture: en-US, Identified Page: (empty - not found), Operation Messages: ActiveTab: 75/ IsSecure: False

observations: URL generation automatically produces URLs for all configured portal aliases and locales
Custom page name is appended to the URL without the .aspx extension
Query strings are properly appended to generated URLs with the '?' separator

The Page to Test dropdown only shows valid pages, so testing with an invalid page ID directly is not possible via the UI. Invalid page testing was performed through URL Rewriting with a non-existent page URL
URL Rewriting test correctly identifies page, language, and TabId from friendly URLs
Admin-only access restriction is enforced - the feature is only accessible through the Persona Bar Settings panel
